Address.Address1: BLOCK 20, SHEN GANG NO. 1, FUTIAN NAN ROAD

Description.Text: The hotel offers a wide range of facilities, assuring its guests a comfortable stay. It has an outdoor pool, a restaurant and spacious accommodation with free Wi-Fi access. Fax and photocopying services can be found at the business centre. Luggage storage is available at the 24-hour front desk.
